typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PATENT_ORG_NAME as string,
		LOAD_FILE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[("NIH/Patents")]) ~> StagePatents
source(output(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PATENT_ORG_NAME as string,
		LOAD_FILE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DefaultDimPatent
StagePatents derive(PATENT_ID = rtrim(substring(byName('PATENT_ID'), 1, 30)),
		PATENT_TITLE = rtrim(substring(byName('PATENT_TITLE'), 1, 500)),
		PROJECT_ID = rtrim(substring(byName('PROJECT_ID'), 1, 30)),
		CREATED_DATE = currentTimestamp()) ~> MapPatents
SelectDistinctPatents keyGenerate(output(PATENT_KEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> PatentSurrogateKey
MapPatents aggregate(groupBy(PATENT_ID),
	each(match(name!='PATENT_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregatePatents
PatentSurrogateKey, DefaultDimPatent union(byName: true)~> UnionDefaultDimPatent
AggregatePatents select(mapColumn(
		PATENT_ID,
		PATENT_TITLE,
		CREATED_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDistinctPatents
UnionDefaultDimPatent sink(filePattern:'DimPatent',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimPatentCurated
UnionDefaultDimPatent sink(truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		PATENT_ID,
		PATENT_TITLE,
		CREATED_DATE,
		PATENT_KEY
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimPatent
